dialogue.String: Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, �[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.1�
Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?1�
I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.1�
Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.1�

Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Traitor in the Midst(pt.1).Traitor in the Midst(pt.2).Traitor in the Midst(pt.3).Traitor in the Midst(pt.4).Traitor in the Midst(pt.5).Traitor in the Midst(pt.6).Betrayal at Beaucedine(pt.1).Betrayal at Beaucedine(pt.2).On Thin Ice(pt.1).On Thin Ice(pt.2).Dungeons and Dancers(pt.1).Dungeons and Dancers(pt.2).Dungeons and Dancers(pt.3).Dungeons and Dancers(pt.4).Distorter of Time(pt.1).Distorter of Time(pt.2).The Will of the World.Songbirds in a Snowstorm(pt.1).Songbirds in a Snowstorm(pt.2).Songbirds in a Snowstorm(pt.3).Songbirds in a Snowstorm(pt.4).Songbirds in a Snowstorm(pt.5).Songbirds in a Snowstorm(pt.6).Songbirds in a Snowstorm(pt.7).Beneath the Mask.Fork in the Road.1�
Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.1�
Phew... That was a close shave.1�
Gahaha... I'm impressed.1�
Let me introduce myself.I'm Larzos, Captain of the Bismuth Musketeers and a Spitewarden of Lady Lilith.1�
We might stand on opposin' sides of the board, but you've got guts. I like people with guts.1�
I've got a feeling we're gonna get along just fine.1�
Wh-what's that rumbling!?1�
Ceithir! We're not finished yet!1�
Lilisette!�
Get down!�

)�
The synergy image has taken form!�
The enemy procession approaches from the direction of Tavnazia.1�
Their advance guard is expected to reach the glacier by way of the high road within the hour.�
Good work, soldier.1�
As intelligence reports suggested, their intent is to merge with the main beastman force stationed in Castle Zvahl via Beaucedine and Xarcabard.1�
Then our objective remains unchanged: the annihilation of the enemy force, and failing that, the obstruction of their advance.1�
Let us review the strategy.The Madder Falcons will stand in wait for the enemy procession and engage them head on.1�
Immediately after which, the Red Roses will strike from the rear and seal off their retreat.1�
Our two units will cripple the enemy in one swift blow. Is that clear?1�
Trial: Unleash the additional effect of the prescribed weapon a set number of times against the assigned  [experience-yielding monsters/monsters].1�
! Over here!1�
Such a bleak, desolate place...1�
Are you familiar with this region,  ?1�

Considering how expansive the glacier is, it wouldn't be feasible to wander around aimlessly, hoping to stumble upon a clue.I say we first investigate each of the magic towers scattered about here and--1�
What in the--!?1�
Watch out!�
Phew...That was a close call. You owe me lunch for that,  .1�
There!1�
That outfit reminds me of the two we encountered at La Vaule...1�
Another one of those Spitewardens!?1�
Th-that over there... It couldn't be...1�
Ceithir!?1�
B-but...why!?1�
Of all the caits, why did it have to be him!?He was such a good lad...so much promise...1�
Hush! Keep it down!1�
They're discussing something...�
...We gotta locate and secure the matron, sooner's the better.1�
Time's about run out.1�
Something monumental will soon take place at Xarcabard, yes? Any moment now?1�
Yeah. Lady Lilith's sure of it.1�
Nyahahahaha! Let me furnish you with a word of warning. Offer friendly advice.1�
Slow, absent-minded, and clumsy Naoi may be, but her tenacity belongs in a class of its own. Completely without rival.1�
Hah! What's an ordinary cat gonna do?You give your peer far too much credit.1�
How dare he!? My stock is of the highest pedigree!1�
F-fool! Can't you pick a better time to be delicate!?1�
Nyahaha, speak of the devil! It's been a while, Naoi!1�
And who've you got there with you, hmmm? What the cat's dragged in?A ragtag band of second-rate adventurers--oh, I'm sorry, I meant to say the Champions of the Dawn! Nyahahaha!1�
H-hold your tongue!1�

Listen to me, Naoi. Step back and take in a full view of the playing board, and you'll realize the poor position your side is in. Between a rock and a hard place.It's plain to see who will prevail!1�
This the dancer lass Haudrale was speakin' of?The one wearin' the feathered ornament?1�
So...which one is it?1�
Despicable brute! Brutish beast!You deceived Ceithir!1�
Because of you, Ochd and Dha...<sniff>...1�
Absolutely unforgivable! Must be made to pay!1�
Hahaha... Yeah, that's good...Burn, cat. Burn with your anger and hatred, for these are things that give birth to conflict.1�
And conflict is what'll grant victory to me and my comrades.1�
We've no use for the other two. Finish them.1�
Hahaha. It would seem that   is always one step ahead of us, Altennia.1�
I believed in my heart that you would come,  . Thank you.1�
Hastily though we prepared for departure, it shames me to think that we were left in your wake yet again.1�
Well met,  . Altennia has shared with me much of your exploits on behalf of the Kingdom.Suffice it to say my expectations of you have been raised to lofty heights.1�
Now then, without further ado, let us prepare a rousing welcome for the approaching beastman force.I propose we first dispatch scouts to ascertain the enemy's route of passage.1�
I cannot claim to be well acquainted with this region, and would feel most comfortable entrusting this matter to you, Lieutenant.1�
It would be my pleasure. Let us do it this way, then.1�
Each reconnaissance squad shall comprise two scouts.Captain Gissenne, if you and Altennia could form the first squad, I would place the western area in your charge.1�
Understood.1�
And you two ladies, I would be most obliged if you could center your activities around the eastern reaches of the glacier.1�
Lastly,   and myself shall tend to the area surrounding the northern tower. That is where the likelihood of the enemy's passage is greatest.1�

Investigate the tower?Yes.Later.1�
If only we had a way to draw its attention...1�
Hmmm... How about...this?1�
Lilisette produces  $���� from her pocket!�
What is it? What does it do?1�
It's an enchanted item that gives its wearer the power to transform into a cuddly, chirping chocobo chick at will!1�
  transforms into an irresistibly cute chocobo chick!�
The high-pitched chirping of a chocobo chick will surely draw Cait Sith's attention.After all, no self-respecting feline could possibly resist such delectable bait!1�
But chirping alone is bound to get old.Be sure to mix things up a bit to keep our target on the hook.1�
Keep in mind, though, that the enchantment lasts only for a short duration.1�
Once you've lured Cait Sith close enough, I'll stun it silly!We only have one chance at this! Failure is not an option!1�
Meow meow meow!?Wh-what am I doing, straying away from my hiding place? Wandering about?1�
This is giving me a splitting headache...1�
Looks like we've gone and made it wary.We'll have to wait awhile until it grows complacent again.1�
Awww, you almost had it,  !Pull up your socks and let's try again!1�

What can I help you with?Nothing.Performance assessment.New Allied Tags.Temporary items.Union registration.Teleportation.Information on the Allied Campaign.1�
You've already undergone an evaluation for this battle, or had you forgotten?As much as I'd like to, I'm forbidden from providing you with a new set of Allied Taegs until the next battle begins.1�

I am sorry,  , but your campaign medal has expired. I cannot issue tags to anyone not authorized by the Allied Forces. Return to your nation's capital and speak with a Campaign Evaluation Official.1�

Register for a union?No.Yes.1�

Your steadfast efforts have earned you a claim to share in your union's spoils of war.By  �[transferring to another union/resigning from your union], you will relinquish this right.It is not my place to question your decision, but I suggest you pay the matter due heed.1�
�[Transfer unions/Resign from your current union]?No.Yes.1�

The supply unit carrying rations and munitions to our stronghold in this area was attacked en route, and forced to abandon the cargo. You are to locate the supplies and deliver them to their final destination.1�
Hey, you're in the way.We fortifyin' this here wall to withstand the beastmen's siege turrets.So how's about just gettin' outta here before you get hurt.1�
Unless you're willin' to wipe that helpless look off your face and lend us a hand.That'd be a different story.1�

Assist with the fortifications?Show them how it's done!Refuse to help.Ask for an explanation.1�
Alright! That's the spirit!Let's get a move on, then.1�
Alright! That's the spirit!Let's get a move on, then.1�
Alright! That's the spirit!Let's get a move on, then.1�

Like I said, in preparation for an enemy assault, we're workin' to fortify these defensive barriers.If you're willin', I'd like to place you in charge of managin' these here craftsmen as they go about it.1�

To be more precise, once you get to each craftsman's position, you have to tell 'em exactly what I'm about to tell you.Namely, what type of crystal they need to be usin'. That's all there is to it.1�
The young Elvaan wearin' the red hat is a blacksmith.Make sure he's using fire crystals.1�
The adorable little Tarutaru with the blonde braids is laying plaster.Gonna have to get her on some ice crystals.1�
The Hume lady is a stonemason, and a darn good one.She's gonna be needin' wind crystals.1�
That old coot of an Elvaan with the huge axe strapped across his back is a carpenter.Famous 'round these parts. Make sure you get him workin' with earth crystals.1�
May not look it, but the Mithra with the black kerchief wrapped 'round her noggin is an architect.She's gonna need her lightning crystals.1�
That sprat of a Tarutaru wearin' the blue getup's a handy lil' plumber.Surin' he'll be wantin' his water crystals, no doubt.1�
The good-looking fella in all white does scaffoldin'. Young Hume lad.See to it he's usin' light crystals.1�
The lady Elvaan's a painter. Handles a brush like nobody I never seen.Need dark crystals in that line of work.And that's it.1�
Ahhh, one more thing.If you're too late issuin' your orders, they're liable to up and leave their posts.So be right, and be quick.1�
